author: cnbc.com
title: Ahold Delhaize share buyback update
text:
Zaandam, the Netherlands, May 8, 2018 - Ahold Delhaize has repurchased 2,586,858 of Ahold Delhaize common shares in the period from April 30, 2018 up to and including May 4, 2018. The shares were repurchased at an average price of €19.64 per share for a total consideration of €50.8 million. These repurchases were made as part of the €2 billion share buyback program announced on November 8, 2017.
The total number of shares repurchased under this program to date is 35,808,009 common shares for a total consideration of €660.9 million.
Download the share buyback transactions excel sheet for detailed individual transaction information from www.aholddelhaize.com/en/investors/share-information/share-buy-back-programs/
This press release is issued in connection with the disclosure and reporting obligation set out in Article 2(2) of the EU Regulation that contains technical standards for buyback programs.
Source: Ahold Delhaize
